OtakaraDesc.OTAGBASP:
[UE:Meta key="d9a05d4b69f8497cb127e3949d23d6a9" Scale="1"/]Notice how resplendent the blue of
this slab is! It's called "cobalt blue."
The pigment is extracted from an
ore renowned for honing one's
intuition, intelligence, and reflexes.
Yes, the more I gaze upon it, the more
advanced I feel myself become.
OtakaraDesc.OTAGBMICROFC:
[UE:Meta key="b7219ec6242a420bb9bade7a6697b56b" Scale="1"/]This desk features a built-in display
surely used to show important things
such as maps and vital statistics. No
doubt many heated discussions have
taken place over the matters shown
here. One hopes that those who
worked and fought at this desk also
took breaks for rest and frivolity.
OtakaraDesc.OTAGBAROMBLK:
[UE:Meta key="9ad1efc4fcb54205937e3dc94bacf59c" Scale="1"/]Spinning, spinning, spinning...These
memories are spinning in my head...
Or are they memories of spinning
itself? Wait...what is happening?!
I'm starting to believe this mysterious
black plank actually contains someone
else's memories. Dizzyingly strange!
OtakaraDesc.OTAGBAROMYEL:
[UE:Meta key="6b24783d3b6148a28a359f2d2cb6a897" Scale="1"/]This yellow plank... Simply marvelous!
The text upon it is indecipherable yet
somehow moving. Could it be some
sort of a story? A masterpiece, I'm
sure of it! How exasperating it is not
to be able to read it even as it sits
right here before me.
OtakaraDesc.OTADISC:
[UE:Meta key="564ce005f6814d9ab022b4f04900e40e" Scale="1"/]This disc vexes me greatly. I've
analyzed it, meditated over it, and
even given it a good whack or two,
and still I can't decipher its purpose!
But drawing upon my rather prodigious
treasure knowledge, I surmise it is
either a piece of equipment used for
gathering solar energy, or it's a
weapon capable of reflecting light
at troublesome beasts to scare
them off. Quite useful either way!
OtakaraDesc.OTASFCMOUSE:
[UE:Meta key="06c12e04ac0e4f6baceb5c31d79c2c4f" Scale="1"/]Can you feel it? The creative energy
that flows through this object is
undeniable! The color, the curvature,
the smoothness to the touch... They
light up the right side of the brain—
the side that governs the arts.
Infinite imagined possibilities await!
OtakaraDesc.OTANESCLASSICMINI:
[UE:Meta key="64844e56f0594baf861bce7213c05a2b" Scale="1"/]The cross-shaped structure on this
device is not only satisfying to press
up, down, and side to side but also
clearly moves something. Strange to
say, but I almost feel as though it's
controlling...me. But WHO would be
controlling me? I must know who it is!
OtakaraDesc.OTAGCCONWB:
[UE:Meta key="1070cf55fa3f499abd09262b60e2172b" Scale="1"/]Beauty soars to new heights here.
This magnificent sculpture captures
the form of a white bird gliding
through air. But what does it MEAN?
I say this isn't just about a bird. This
is about freedom. Just look at it—
it IS freedom itself!
OtakaraDesc.OTAJOYCONL:
[UE:Meta key="4a8c709439164ef68a36fc8d99b04336" Scale="1"/]Do you believe in psychic powers?
You will once you observe this device's
uncanny behavior. That is, it vibrates
all on its own! Surely this is proof
that telekinesis—or yes, even
psychokinesis—exist. Gaaah!
Did it just vibrate again?!
OtakaraDesc.OTAJOYCONR:
[UE:Meta key="04463e29598e4181afbe1d0a4e97971d" Scale="1"/]This enigmatic object seems designed
to connect to something. Or maybe
to make a connection between two
things. But what does it connect to,
or whom does it connect? Well,
we can all agree that everything is
better with connection than without.
OtakaraDesc.OTADARTS:
[UE:Meta key="1108ff5bb1d0488aa8e6432da372bd88" Scale="1"/]In times of old, competitors would face
off against one another to see who
could throw this enormous spear the
farthest. It was said that the only way
to take the winner's spot was to train
as relentlessly as the spear flies.
That is to say, competitors had to
give their all to their spear training...
Nothing less than total focus, total
dedication, and total confidence would
do. Those who give their all found
they could throw this spear very
far indeed!
OtakaraDesc.OTAHIMEFORK:
[UE:Meta key="d616e0c540254f95bdf7cc5e11e4e620" Scale="1"/]This treasure has not only two prongs
but two personalities. That is, it's so
beautifully designed a noble person
might hang it on their wall as a
decoration. At the same time, it's
so fierce a warrior might use it as
a weapon. A spear appreciated by
rulers and warriors alike... That is
a mighty spear indeed!
OtakaraDesc.OTAICEPICK:
[UE:Meta key="2b0264da5cc74187a9303a1fa268be4d" Scale="1"/]What would you say if I told you
this spear is capable of shattering
everything from a single solid stone
to an entire iceberg? Would you shake
your head in disbelief? Well, it's the
truth! In fact, it works so well that
should you start using it to break
things, you might find it hard to stop
using it to break things. It's just so
satisfying! Of course, that's how one
suddenly finds oneself surrounded
by nothing but rubble.
OtakaraDesc.OTABRUSHA:
[UE:Meta key="f0a73ad0f3fe4a7898eb8cda418b6d92" Scale="1"/]Surely such a large brush could be
used to scrub a great many things.
The mind boggles at the possibilities!
Of course, one must use such a
powerful tool of cleansing wisely.
Think carefully before you proceed!
OtakaraDesc.OTABRUSHB:
[UE:Meta key="d2d2cf31dfe64a569144c1be2e5edd37" Scale="1"/]The soft bristles of this brush—how
good they feel when scrubbing one's
own back. But how easy it is to lose
yourself in the feeling. As they say,
"Too much of a good thing is a bad
thing." Don't be fooled by this brushing
vice! Know when enough is enough!
OtakaraDesc.OTATOOTHMODEL:
[UE:Meta key="2aef576008084aa8b6219d98e9e41e1f" Scale="1"/]What enormous creature could these
teeth belong to? And how did it come
to part with them? The mind reels to
imagine it all. Though this much we
do know... The straightness and
whiteness of the teeth suggest it
had access to excellent dental care.
OtakaraDesc.OTASHINJITSU:
[UE:Meta key="f95410fc2be542b5a6ac8e487c88e40b" Scale="1"/]Slip a coin into the mouth of this
machine, and in return it will tell you
a joke. Or so I'm told. But so far, it's
only returned silence for every coin
I've put in it. Perhaps it's broken.
Or perhaps...the joke is on me?
OtakaraDesc.OTAOSHABURIBLU:
[UE:Meta key="062829fba7e14330a1f61ff06420fb80" Scale="1"/]What a surprise it is to find that this
lollipop offers no flavor at all. The odd
protuberance is neither sweet nor
savory...and yet, mysteriously, it lures
one into sucking on it. Even more
surprising: once you have a taste of
this flavorless lollipop, you are almost
certain to feel so soothed that hours
fly by in a satisfied haze.
OtakaraDesc.OTABOTTLE:
[UE:Meta key="ff1186e4a67140aebf45b931cb095cd5" Scale="1"/]This shape... It is at once familiar and
also comforting. Surely this sculpture
was erected to remind us that a
mother's love is universal.
OtakaraDesc.OTAFEEDDISH:
[UE:Meta key="cbeff35871b744bcab762988b25bd43e" Scale="1"/]This bathing apparatus is sure to
be the envy of all who see it. Though
primarily used for delightfully
refreshing cold plunges, it can also
hold hot water if it's delivered.
True, the edges are slippery,
but once you're in, it offers hours
of carefree splashing.
OtakaraDesc.OTAENGAGERING:
[UE:Meta key="87684afcedae420b90e53343872c9e55" Scale="1"/]A hoop topped by a stone made of
the hardest substance in the
universe—a perfect gift to give when
making an unbreakable promise!
Though...I am told this stone can,
in fact, be broken. Perhaps, then,
it's meant as a reminder that no
promise is truly unbreakable?
OtakaraDesc.OTARINGPOP:
[UE:Meta key="5957f94b3fe5481e82a6efd0db03d10f" Scale="1"/]Not only is this glimmering gem quite
beautiful but the mineral it's composed
of is notable for being highly sticky.
Often given as a present to a loved
one, it represents a bond that is
equally adhesive.
OtakaraDesc.OTAYAMASHINJU:
[UE:Meta key="d53ff1574dc84379bb2e1f6dcf9d2a7f" Scale="1"/]It's said a king gave this orb to his
beloved daughter and that it contains
all the wisdom the princess would need
as next ruler of the land. Note it is not
especially flashy. One can assume
that's because good leadership is not
about flash but about substance.
OtakaraDesc.OTAGOLDBAR:
[UE:Meta key="2212036df9a9442899b8f85d262081b9" Scale="1"/]This shiny table is used in a ceremony
meant to bring good luck with money.
It works like this: jump over the table
once, and make a profit. Jump over it
twice, and make a fortune. Jump over
it thrice, and the sky opens and
money rains down on you. Or so
one hopes, anyway.
OtakaraDesc.OTACANDLE:
[UE:Meta key="20c0055e36924f42ab5e4b34c9aba9ed" Scale="1"/]You can't see the artistry at work
here with your eyes, but take a deep
breath, and your nose will behold
the power and beauty at once. One
whiff, and your heart will light up!
Surely this gorgeous olfactory
sculpture belongs in an art gallery!
OtakaraDesc.OTALIGHTUPRINGBLU:
[UE:Meta key="5f38fe92a8fc426380e0c9b68836adfd" Scale="1"/]Step through this glowing blue hoop,
and you will feel its healing effects
almost at once. Exhaustion is gone!
Ailments of the heart and the body
banished! You have but to make the
choice to step through it.
OtakaraDesc.OTALIGHTUPRINGRED:
[UE:Meta key="6ecf36a82bc34c2b83b965542b1b0d5c" Scale="1"/]Is your relationship missing the spark
it once had? Are you stuck in a rut
with the one you love? This hoop can
help! Step through the glowing pink
light, and feel the passion return. The
warmth that shines upon you is sure
to remind you of the day you met.
OtakaraDesc.OTALIGHTUPRINGYEL:
[UE:Meta key="418b6a3344784a9a95755a53259e0c2c" Scale="1"/]Do you ever wish you had good luck?
With this hoop, you need not wish!
Step through its glowing yellow center,
and good fortune is sure to follow.
Of course, for this to work, it helps
if you believed it was going to work
in the first place.
OtakaraDesc.OTABOARDERASER:
[UE:Meta key="0b7f7502bf174e9cb5aa7c486c959834" Scale="1"/]If it's a good night's sleep you're
seeking, this bed can help. Not only is
it quite spacious and comfortable but
if you flip it over, it will coat you in a
fine cloud of dust that is said to
encourage sweet dreams. But
bring a lint roller for when you're
done sleeping.
OtakaraDesc.OTASPONGEA:
[UE:Meta key="da38b18ee5644afe9132c2d9e59ef6a3" Scale="1"/]This giant dog-shaped bed is the
perfect spot for a canine companion
to sleep on. It is quite thick and good
at absorbing slobber if your favorite
pooch friend is prone to such things.
Also, a dog sleeping on a dog-shaped
mattress... What could be cuter?
OtakaraDesc.OTASPONGEB:
[UE:Meta key="5726829e97cf454fb5ac1ed39057eab4" Scale="1"/]Birds have long been a symbol of
freedom and good luck. In fact, if one
appears in your dreams at night, then
good fortune is sure to visit you during
the day. With that in mind, sleep on this
bed, and you're almost guaranteed to
find birds flocking to your dreams.
OtakaraDesc.OTASPONGEC:
[UE:Meta key="629096381fbc49c2acf20964cc0bf62c" Scale="1"/]It's said that life first came from the
sea. So it's no surprise that we are
so deeply connected to water. Thus
this bed, with its fish-shaped design,
is meant to lull one to sleep with
visions of floating. Just lay down and
let the dreams wash over you.
OtakaraDesc.OTACASINOCHIP1:
[UE:Meta key="11f17709c78d4af595c8136c05a87dd0" Scale="1"/]Do not be fooled by its silence! You are
in the presence of the most intelligent
life-form in the known universe. Based
on its appearance, it's clear this
creature can exude feelings of joy and
delight. It was likely at the center of
many social gatherings long ago.
OtakaraDesc.OTACASINOCHIP10:
[UE:Meta key="d53afd11159b475cb8823d07a56188e5" Scale="1"/]Better keep an eye out when in close
proximity to this sentient disk.
Apparently it has a bit of an anger-
management problem. Further details
about its tendency to lash out have
been lost to time—which makes it all
the more intimidating, doesn't it?
OtakaraDesc.OTACASINOCHIP25:
[UE:Meta key="944326d7f75e49f6981968b2c87086df" Scale="1"/]In moments of sorrow, it may be
helpful to consult with this unusually
intelligent life-form. Empathy is one of
the highest forms of intelligence, so
this disk surely has more than enough
to share with you. You may not be able
to hear its wisdom, but you will feel it.
OtakaraDesc.OTACASINOCHIP50:
[UE:Meta key="bda793cadb0d40e8ba8b55b4cae06363" Scale="1"/]Sometimes you wake up and decide
that today will be unlike every other
standard-issue day. "Today," you tell
yourself, "will be filled with fun and
amusement!" And what could be more
amusing than dancing? Why, nothing!
On days like this, simply grab this disk
and get your groove on. Swing it round
with abandon! Yes, soon enough, you
will have to return to life as usual. But
I promise it's OK to let your inner
rhythm take you away on occasion.
OtakaraDesc.OTACASINOCHIP100:
[UE:Meta key="ce0844491dd5454cab3472541ac45e09" Scale="1"/]Should you ever find yourself stunned
beyond words, this wise creature will
be a true friend to you. Let its waves
of knowledge wash over you and bring
about a deep inner calm. Indeed,
there's something soothing about
simply being in its presence.
OtakaraDesc.OTAGAMAGUCHI:
[UE:Meta key="7f122d66ffd34fe495f987dcee9402af" Scale="1"/]The spine-tingling "snap" created by
this object stimulates feelings of
greed within anyone in earshot.
The reasons behind this are unknown.
Perhaps it reawakens a primal
sensation hidden in the depths of our
hearts, but this is mere conjecture.
OtakaraDesc.OTAPAPERCRANEBLU:
[UE:Meta key="a412d516828a41efa16811668ae2a21d" Scale="1"/]Someone put a great deal of work into
crafting this particular replica of an
avian creature. Clearly each inch,
each crevice has been infused with
the sweat and prayers of its creator.
But all that hard work and dedication
has paid off. Behold! The aura that
emanates from these folds foretells of
great things to come. Perhaps
happiness truly does arrive on the
wings of a bird.
OtakaraDesc.OTAPAPERCRANERED:
[UE:Meta key="17d85b54336c4a9ea780630b23815a95" Scale="1"/]A sculpture representing the charred
skin cast off by the immortal phoenix.
The red paper is clearly inspired by the
color of its flaming wings. Though
immortality is an impossible wish for
any living creature, this bird is imbued
with the fervent desire for a miracle.
OtakaraDesc.OTAPAPERCRANEGLD:
[UE:Meta key="ddad8cd926e44dde86ce112e3dfd652b" Scale="1"/]This golden paper sculpture is modeled
after a bird known to invite good
fortune. Laden with luck, it's sure to
make many a wish come true. And as
the desires held within this universe
are endless, this bird may spread
happiness for millennia to come.
OtakaraDesc.OTAPAPERBALLOON:
[UE:Meta key="101f5b3bfc9f434bad9c718f6744ae8c" Scale="1"/]Made from paper so impossibly thin
it appears to be the handiwork of a
higher being. Be careful not to lose
sight of this balloon. Despite its size,
it can float along the faintest breeze.
Just one gust of wind might carry it
above the clouds beyond your grasp.
OtakaraDesc.OTAKENDAMAA:
[UE:Meta key="d6ae0b9e8878490eb7794fd37357be70" Scale="1"/]These balls were an integral part of a
ritual performed during New Year
festivals. Each ball was imbued with
people's hopes and dreams, and if
caught by the ritual pole, those hopes
and dreams were bound to come true.
What a joy it must've been to witness
such a beautiful tradition.
OtakaraDesc.OTAKENDAMAB:
[UE:Meta key="b911aae3114c45cebbf05d09a9d78f45" Scale="1"/]This ritual pole was used during an
ancient festival held at the start of
each new year. If the ball landed on
the sharp end, the people's wishes
would come true and they would dance
in celebration. Though it's commonly
believed the people danced either way.
OtakaraDesc.OTABOAT:
[UE:Meta key="c31e36b3680645028c892f94271faf46" Scale="1"/]A rare and precious boat that does
not float. It was once used to predict
a village's future. If, by some miracle,
the boat remained slightly buoyant in
water, it meant that the village had
the approval of the gods. Sadly, the
boat's shoddy construction makes that
seem like a rather unlikely outcome.
OtakaraDesc.OTAHANDSPINNER:
[UE:Meta key="0612e2e45e1a406a97eef7485d6c9cd8" Scale="1"/]This object rotates with tremendous
force if spun along its center axis.
Just as its name implies, its design
was inspired by the rotational
structure of space. Much like with
space, you're forced to ask yourself,
"Where and when does it all end?"
OtakaraDesc.OTAGOLDFISH:
[UE:Meta key="3a6d2554b469407c92cbc4b78a6bf42f" Scale="1"/]A sacred fish created to amuse and
comfort the ancient gods. They would
submerge the fish in a heavenly spring
and while the hours away pretending
to catch and feed it. It would seem the
gods had blessed themselves with way
too much free time.
OtakaraDesc.OTACASTANETS:
[UE:Meta key="48396a280ef74e52b1d2d659a34256ac" Scale="1"/]This clam-like sound generator is
all-natural. The purity of its
percussive tone is irresistible.
Clack-clack!
OtakaraDesc.OTASMALLBELL:
[UE:Meta key="79fbea3bf9d44c52b75f8a9f03fe3121" Scale="1"/]Do you have one of those spouses
who loves to play pranks on you? For
example, one who gets a laugh from
sneaking up and startling you with a
"boo!" Well, put this on your prank-
pulling partner, and you'll always know
when they are approaching. It's a
must-have item for the spouse who
wants to have the last laugh.
OtakaraDesc.OTAHORNBELL:
[UE:Meta key="1accd0e29a534165a39465f456845abe" Scale="1"/]This warning device, worn by ancient
guardian deities, would be rung
loudly for all to hear when a villager
committed a wrongdoing. Anyone who
heard it would then immediately fall
to the ground, clearing the way for
the guardians to pass.
OtakaraDesc.OTAGARAGARA:
[UE:Meta key="4cd933b6aef64f12b636ba62c162c27d" Scale="1"/]Crying when you want to cry, laughing
when you want to laugh, acting on your
every impulse without worrying about
the consequences... Ah, to be a baby
again. This treasure elicits feelings of
nostalgia for that time and memories
of the love and joy a baby can bring.
OtakaraDesc.OTAMUSICBOXA:
[UE:Meta key="4c673ff12dbe4910a993c8ef8f5725d4" Scale="1"/]This device plays a beautiful melody
that elicits feelings of nostalgia.
There's something so familiar about
it, and yet at the same time, it's
completely unknown. Mysterious,
to be sure!
OtakaraDesc.OTAMUSICBOXB:
[UE:Meta key="fbbfd25293324349a41ad8d26494a679" Scale="1"/]The song played on this device is
intended to make the listener feel
sleepy and yet terrified to fall asleep
at the same time. How odd that a
piece of music can make you feel like
you're staring down a mouth full of
razor-sharp teeth.
OtakaraDesc.OTAMUSICBOXC:
[UE:Meta key="425ff40ec9df4b72b92bda3cceb20e40" Scale="1"/]To feel the excitement of a grand
adventure, all you need to do is play
this device! It seems to sing of heroic
tales and captured princesses...
I hope one day I'm able to sell these
rare treasures to a hero as valiant
as these dulcet tones.
OtakaraDesc.OTASPEAKER:
[UE:Meta key="89fc7f5b19fe433aa8bc2817bf1f023d" Scale="1"/]Your voice is weak. It does not carry.
No one notices you. If this is true,
then this item is for you! Starting
today, you are a gym teacher!
You will never be ignored again.
OtakaraDesc.OTAHANDBELL:
[UE:Meta key="05775c5834cb42bf82281718f0fc14d4" Scale="1"/]This great bell has traditionally been
rung at the end of each day, each
month, and each year. And what a
beautiful tone to mark the passage
of time! Of course, once one counts up
how many times they've rung this bell,
that pretty jingle may turn into quite
the startling jangle. How is it that so
much time has flown by?!
OtakaraDesc.OTAHARMONICA:
[UE:Meta key="c8833a1bdd4e4231922a44ed0414ea53" Scale="1"/]Ah, what striking tones do play as
the wind dances through this silvery
treasure! The musical notes that flow
from the holes announce the arrival of
a breeze, and in doing so they weave a
song both sweet and melancholy. It's a
sentimental soundtrack... One best
suited for a fall afternoon spent
contemplating the passing of
the seasons.
OtakaraDesc.OTAOCARINABRN:
[UE:Meta key="84749c2be94d42e0a323a255e42fb495" Scale="1"/]It seems that something—or more
likely some things—lived within the
inner cavity of this device. What
were these things? What was their
purpose? Were they forced to live
there together as part of an
experiment? Some things are
destined to remain unknown.
OtakaraDesc.OTARAPPA:
[UE:Meta key="6e56a1ee2f40447484691be491384f28" Scale="1"/]Bounce on the squishy bulb end to
produce an earth-shattering roar the
likes of which you've never heard!
Large brass instruments such as this
added volume to band performances.
Just don't stand in front of the horn
end if you like your eardrums.
OtakaraDesc.OTAWHISTLE:
[UE:Meta key="f08f2c2a4304416ca1b8712921307686" Scale="1"/]Healing tones are old news? Well,
greet the new trend: super sounds
of awakening! Air passing through
the inner chamber plays a high note
that acts as an acoustic refreshment.
OtakaraDesc.OTAPADLOCK:
[UE:Meta key="f03827d5d87f40a49c4cf37c09ff3009" Scale="1"/]Store your valuables in this bag
for guaranteed peace of mind. Of
course, that's easier said than done.
Its defenses make it impregnable
and virtually impossible to break.
But that's only a problem if you want
to see your possessions ever again.
OtakaraDesc.OTAHAIRPIN:
[UE:Meta key="967a5bb7ef064bf69dcce2eb7f176b26" Scale="1"/]Feeling down? Then simply shake this
stick at a dormant tree, and its
flowers will immediately come to life!
You may ask how this is possible, but
mysterious and ancient technology is
beyond our comprehension. Simply put,
it's magic. Let's just leave it at that,
shall we?
OtakaraDesc.OTABUTTONPLASTIC:
[UE:Meta key="5086bdb05978447ea7d263477aa1a4e5" Scale="1"/]This item would have been placed
between two objects and used to
connect them. It's not clear what
these objects might have been,
but something such as this would
have done the job gently and aptly.
At least, that's my best guess!
OtakaraDesc.OTABUTTONMETAL:
[UE:Meta key="65baf48c28ae484f8f84afd7d6a2ce84" Scale="1"/]What you see here is a cover used to
disguise a pit or trap, probably as a
way to catch small animals. The people
of this planet hunted in groups and
used their cunning to develop this
system. Another proud example of
civilization and its infinite wisdom!
OtakaraDesc.OTABUTTONWOOD:
[UE:Meta key="1064278ffe8c44a6bddce5bd2d22c682" Scale="1"/]A round raft meant for a single
occupant. It floats using the water's
surface tension. Those holes in the
middle allow the passenger a delightful
glimpse of the water below. Then
again, one might consider plugging
those holes if one is worried about
the raft taking on water.
OtakaraDesc.OTACOLLAR:
[UE:Meta key="1b36413756fe4ffbaff790be0c6e91fc" Scale="1"/]Dogs have been our dear and most
faithful companions since the dawn of
civilization. This necklace represents
that ancient and honorable bond, both
physically and spiritually. A well-worn
necklace such as this is the mark of a
friendship like no other.
OtakaraDesc.OTATHERMOMETER:
[UE:Meta key="155eee23328d478fbb53a5903605059b" Scale="1"/]Touch the tip of this device to your
cheek, and you'll find the number that
appears there matches the warmth of
your heart. When faced with stress
or anger, apply this sensor to your
skin. Is the number higher? If so, it's
time to focus on keeping your cool.
OtakaraDesc.OTACOUNTER:
[UE:Meta key="38dfc6e78b9a469c9b1a114aca630057" Scale="1"/]This timepiece doesn't measure the
passage of time in general but the
passage of time as felt by the one
holding it. The user presses the top
button once per second. But how fast
or slow they press it depends on what
a second feels like to them. Profound!
OtakaraDesc.OTADENTAKU:
[UE:Meta key="7777bff5759145639a0db4f3541ddc96" Scale="1"/]This clever exercise machine combines
the joys of doing math with the thrill of
physical exertion. When performing
complex math tasks, simply jump from
key to key to key. I daresay finding
solutions to math problems has never
been so fun!
OtakaraDesc.OTACARDDENTAKU:
[UE:Meta key="3c8cc84aca4642d0bc8d9e02500e4f6a" Scale="1"/]This enormous computing machine
not only allows for complex number
crunching but ensures these critical
calculations can be completed
whenever needed. Note the enormous
solar cell that powers it. Whoever built
this marvel has harnessed the
incandescent fury of the sun
itself...and used it for math!
OtakaraDesc.OTAGRIPPER:
[UE:Meta key="c900259752a24682b21e18329a5bc73f" Scale="1"/]Exercise is good for many things. It
not only makes us stronger, it also
helps us live healthier lives. So grab
each of this exercise machine's
handles and squeeeeze! As every
muscle strains at the effort, take
comfort knowing you're adding
good things to your life.
OtakaraDesc.OTAGOLFBALL:
[UE:Meta key="ff01277a46cf4036a8809a6bf601284f" Scale="1"/]This communication sphere has fallen
from its place orbiting the planet.
Note how the bumpy surface was
designed to maximize transmissions.
A pity that it is no longer functioning.
Hmm, perhaps a blow with a large
stick could launch it back into orbit.
OtakaraDesc.OTATENNISBALL:
[UE:Meta key="595e2c874775467aaf28c9d764ea8c0e" Scale="1"/]Put your hands on the surface of this
sphere, and don't be surprised if you
find yourself awash in waves of fuzzy
imagery. The surface texture recalls
the warmth of a fall sweater, the feel
of grass on a summer day, and the
prickly thrill of a hard-fought victory.
OtakaraDesc.OTAHARDBALL:
[UE:Meta key="94d82baf013b47299a1aa94bc3419c4b" Scale="1"/]There's something about this orb that
makes one want to hit it with a stick in
a moment of joyful abandon. Of course,
such behavior is sure to spell trouble.
I can see it now: the orb sent flying
through the air, only to crash through
the window of a neighboring home.
Then the neighbor—failing to
appreciate the gleeful innocence of
the moment—unleashing a good ol'-
fashioned tirade. No, no matter how
fun it may seem, do NOT send this orb
sailing through the air.
OtakaraDesc.OTAGODDESS:
[UE:Meta key="5f7e21b08cf9493b89f6ec9e921ac7e2" Scale="1"/]This lamp is the very definition of
inspiring. With the figure of a proud
woman holding a torch on high, it not
only lights up a room with its glow but
lights up the spirits of those who gaze
upon it.
OtakaraDesc.OTAVENUS:
[UE:Meta key="fb964be670434f8fadd0613f841ba29a" Scale="1"/]Many have wondered what this statue
would have looked like if the artist had
completed the work. Would the arms
have been folded? Held straight out?
Might wings have been carved where
arms belong? If only the artist hadn't
stopped at such a crucial juncture.
Though, I confess, nothing is more fun
than guessing when there's no right
answer to be found.
OtakaraDesc.OTARODAN:
[UE:Meta key="01e48202928440c1bcd2e0e1b16c9c96" Scale="1"/]When one comes upon this landmark,
one can't help but contemplate many
things. First, what is this figure
contemplating? Moreover, what should
I be contemplating?! Open your mind to
big questions like these, and you're
sure to contemplate great things.
OtakaraDesc.OTAMOAI:
[UE:Meta key="659d034835d443c3b48da222a60e32b2" Scale="1"/]This fossil is all that remains of a
heroic giant from ancient times. He
was known for showing compassion to
not only allies but enemies. As we
contemplate his revered visage, we
should let his past benevolence act as
a guide for our own behavior today.
OtakaraDesc.OTADOGUHEAD:
[UE:Meta key="53512e4c0572475b8c48c371a30f7138" Scale="1"/]On Hocotate, the Ancient Statue Head
is almost as popular as the Gyroid
Bust. With her cool goggles and
dramatic personality, this statue oozes
a mysterious aura, so the competition
between the two makes sense. But
what's even more mysterious is this
figure's missing body!
OtakaraDesc.OTAMANEKINEKO:
[UE:Meta key="98717f73d8d7429195013efc4ce595dd" Scale="1"/]This charming creature beckons to all
who pass by. "Come to me!" it says.
"I'm too adorable to resist." Decorated
with opulent flourishes, it seems to
promise not just friendship but good
fortune as well.
OtakaraDesc.OTADARUMA:
[UE:Meta key="5daf90c3b2384ccbb41dc631145a8ada" Scale="1"/]What a device! Push it over, knock it
down, kick it aside...and it always
bounces back! How it manages to do
so remains a mystery. But if ever
you're feeling discouraged, give this
machine a shove and rejoice in its
return to being upright. May it inspire
you to do the same!
OtakaraDesc.OTAPHOTOFRAME:
[UE:Meta key="374fafa6104d4136afe6bdaea58c0921" Scale="1"/]This device not only stores but also
displays images from the distant past.
And there's something about the
image frozen on the screen now. The
two friendly creatures pictured there
are...familiar...somehow. Try as I might,
I can't quite put my finger on it.
OtakaraDesc.OTAMASK:
[UE:Meta key="2a36b66899264a04aeed768ebc41682a" Scale="1"/]This clever contraption is meant to be
used when you don't want to reveal
your emotions. Stand behind it, and it
will render any expression on your
face unreadable. Its blank eyes and
straight lips will keep your innermost
feelings safe from prying eyes.
OtakaraDesc.OTACHERRY:
[UE:Meta key="4e3592a56e894e51865ab9b2ef7be992" Scale="1"/]A fruit both powerful and delicate! It
reminds me of something I once read...
"Fate's tapestry has unraveled.
Tomorrow weeps. Romance has fallen;
love is madness. To mend the rift
between two cross lovers, this is the
ultimate weapon in Cupid's arsenal."
OtakaraDesc.OTAAPRICOT:
[UE:Meta key="01ad4b68d1b4466892242a5f7fefebb8" Scale="1"/]Try eating this fruit when it's green
and unripe, and you'll end up with a
mouth full of acidic burning. But give
it time to ripen, and it will not only
taste sweet on the tongue but
restore your energy and give you the
endurance to realize great ambitions!
OtakaraDesc.OTABIWA:
[UE:Meta key="cc76cea4cc37488c9b23a06902294286" Scale="1"/]This fruit is a treat for the senses.
Not only is its bright, tear-shaped
form pretty to look at, its soft surface
is also slightly velvety to the touch.
Yes, two senses delighted by one fruit!
Or, as they say, "Two birds, one stone!"
Oh dear! Speaking of stones...do NOT
eat the seeds. They're quite poisonous!
OtakaraDesc.OTAKIWI:
[UE:Meta key="341cdd3d09c24a798a1a4484a0b65198" Scale="1"/]It's a miracle anyone tried to eat this
unpleasant-looking fruit the very first
time. You'd think its hairy exterior
would have scared them off. Yet eat it
they did! And we should all be grateful,
for what a tasty treat it is! Further
proof that luck favors the bold.
OtakaraDesc.OTAKIWIGLD:
[UE:Meta key="49c0629c6ecc4f6f923080acc40dc698" Scale="1"/]"Is the Blonde Impostor simply a
Disguised Delicacy in...disguise?" you
might ask. Not at all! It's very much its
own fruit! It's juicy and sweet, and it
has even more of the beautifying
vitamin, Piktamin U, than its green
cousin. Imposter? Psh. It's as real
as it gets!
OtakaraDesc.OTAGRAPEFRUIT:
[UE:Meta key="9ea66d98dfbb4b6ca72e3ca47ffba273" Scale="1"/]It takes a refined palate to appreciate
all this fruit has to offer. It is at once
sweet, sour, bitter, and even spicy.
But those capable of pushing through
the complex, slightly painful taste
experience will find themselves
greatly rewarded.
OtakaraDesc.OTAMELON:
[UE:Meta key="92c1a79fdfd047a9b8a8308f88d1f4aa" Scale="1"/]From its artistic, cratered exterior
to its delicately sweet interior, the
Wayward Moon is elegance in fruit
form. Mild and aromatic, it would
make a wonderful gift for a friend
or for someone who just needs
a little pick-me-up.
OtakaraDesc.OTARASPBERRY:
[UE:Meta key="1aa60383057a46de9c18c972f707ad38" Scale="1"/]What a charming fruit this is! If it had
a personality, I'd say it was "cute and
bubbly." Such a vibrant and passionate
color too. There's just so much to
love here. But like love itself, this
fruit is delicate, so treat it with care!
OtakaraDesc.OTAPLUM:
[UE:Meta key="ae2b5e9cb34e4dd689aefc7909b5d18e" Scale="1"/]It's true—the rounded surface of this
fruit is smooth as a baby's bottom.
Meanwhile, the pale yellow flesh inside
offers a refreshing flavor profile that
is at once sweet and also sour. Really,
as fruits go, it has much to offer.
OtakaraDesc.OTAPEACH:
[UE:Meta key="5dfe97094dd64d7a9696d28a9ac6b55d" Scale="1"/]What's most impressive about this
fruit is the way it's sweet in both
flavor and aroma. Meanwhile, its
pretty pinkish-orange coloring is lovely
to behold. Of course, one can't ignore
the shapely curves reminiscent of...
eh... Good manners dictate I say no
more. Suffice it to say, the Mock
Bottom is quite a sensory experience.
OtakaraDesc.OTAMUSCAT:
[UE:Meta key="4c64c65d14d14e9baa508b341aa02bac" Scale="1"/]It's difficult to say which aspect of
this fruit is more charming—its pretty
emerald color or how easy it is to
share with friends. Thankfully, you
don't have to choose. Simply gaze
upon the gorgeous green hue as you
share its many orbs at a party.
OtakaraDesc.OTAGRAPE:
[UE:Meta key="0e628b8cea3d4ed4b5acf4f403c05bcb" Scale="1"/]Stare at the deep, dark orbs of this
fruit, and you might fall into a hypnotic
trance. But not to worry. The minute
you take a bite, you'll be snapped from
your reverie by a powerful blast of
sweet juice. What a journey it takes
you on. You may never want to return!
OtakaraDesc.OTAWATERMELON:
[UE:Meta key="5474b2265d6842bab0f32d9a1ba90dbd" Scale="1"/]This thing is enormous... It's the size
of an asteroid, with hard, striped
skin. It's not very inviting. So what a
surprise it was to find that its insides
are bursting with crimson juice. And
seeds too! Plant these in the garden,
and maybe more tasty asteroids
will grow.
OtakaraDesc.OTAMANGOSTEEN:
[UE:Meta key="bb6157188fb24b5a8f8352acfbbba04f" Scale="1"/]It looks for all the world like this fruit
is wearing a jaunty hat! Ah, but the
Dapper Blob's attire is beside the
point. It's the juicy flesh inside...
deeply sweet yet delightfully bitter
too...that's the real star of the show
here! A fruit fit for royalty!
OtakaraDesc.OTAAVOCADO:
[UE:Meta key="6d863037b2f644aabd0d1c1a07974aaf" Scale="1"/]It's a food...and yet it resembles some
kind of scaly beast? Let's agree that
the initial impression is not a good
one! And yet...inside awaits a rich,
creamy culinary delight! Oh, you Scaly
Custard, you. Many have judged you
harshly, and for that, I'm truly sorry.
OtakaraDesc.OTAPAPAYA:
[UE:Meta key="ae9a492ea22740b99788d6273b243ff6" Scale="1"/]There's no other way to say it...
The inside of the Seed Hive is quite
grotesque. That knot of black orbs in
its belly... YUCK! But many seeds
means many cultivation opportunities.
And there's no reason to turn our
noses up at that.
OtakaraDesc.OTASTARFRUIT:
[UE:Meta key="59f936d05973476a8f6405b2049e624e" Scale="1"/]Is this a fruit or a shooting star that's
fallen to the ground? One taste, and
the answer is yours! Better yet, cut
this star into slices, and enjoy yourself
a fruity constellation. How heavenly!
OtakaraDesc.OTAMANGO:
[UE:Meta key="0276227e36d34ed28a23155efe4c4ae7" Scale="1"/]When you lay eyes upon the elegant
tear shape of this fruit, it may just
bring a tear to your own eye. The
perfection of it makes everything else
in life seem somehow less...perfect.
Then, when you taste how perfectly
sweet it is...prepare to weep with joy.
OtakaraDesc.OTABANANA:
[UE:Meta key="56856d60640a492db890cf30c3d7c836" Scale="1"/]Clearly this fruit was designed to be
sent on outings with children. Note the
built-in wrapper that's easy to remove.
But children mustn't toss the wrapper
on the ground. Someone is sure to
slip on it and land on their behind!
Hilarious? Maybe. Painful? Definitely.
OtakaraDesc.OTADRAGONFRUIT:
[UE:Meta key="0ee851f5169a4666b31f029b1a809963" Scale="1"/]Despite its wild and intimidating outer
appearance, this fruit looks quite
fancy and refined on the inside. Tiny
black specks decorate bright white
flesh. All in all, it looks like an egg from
the nest of some fire-breathing
half-animal, half-plant beast!
OtakaraDesc.OTALIME:
[UE:Meta key="980d52108f2f44949074261f1195a2b3" Scale="1"/]A number of fruits look quite similar
to this one. But while it may be
rather forgettable in appearance, its
refreshing fragrance will live in your
memory forever. Those with a mature
palate should also sample its bitter
taste. A zesty experience indeed!
OtakaraDesc.OTAICHIJIKU:
[UE:Meta key="445470f452f54d6cb379525fa19e6957" Scale="1"/]Eat this fruit before it's ripe, and you'll
never do it a second time. Yuck and
blech! But you mustn't get angry. No,
let this be a lesson in patience. For
you see, those with the discipline to
wait until the perfect time to eat the
Delectable Bouquet...they will be
greatly rewarded!
OtakaraDesc.OTAKAKI:
[UE:Meta key="0ddae387ceb94852bd19774d22274ea4" Scale="1"/]This fruit gets its color by soaking up
the rays of each sunset. And though
it's quite bitter during its youth, it
grows increasingly sweet with age
until it's close to perfect as it falls
off the branch. Let this remind us all
to look forward to our sunset years!
OtakaraDesc.OTANASHI:
[UE:Meta key="833402374311435fa337a357bbdc0cfb" Scale="1"/]The amount of moisture contained
inside this fruit is quite shocking!
Underestimate it, and you might bite
down only to find yourself awash in a
sea of juice! Be sure to have a snorkel
at the ready when eating one of these.
OtakaraDesc.OTALAFRANCE:
[UE:Meta key="9041a7ec912047f1ab218677fe2d764b" Scale="1"/]The flavor here is mellow and sweet,
while the aroma is pure elegance.
And speaking of aroma...please
observe the shape. Does this fruit not
resemble a nose? It's quite uncanny,
I say! One wonders if it can smell its
own deliciously aromatic self?
OtakaraDesc.OTAICHIGO:
[UE:Meta key="964238d0205645699e80bc6dda44b2f3" Scale="1"/]No matter how down you may be,
these tasty bursts of joy are almost
sure to turn your mood around. That's
because they're happiness in fruit
form! As the name implies, they plant
seeds of sunny warmth in the middle
of your heart, and there they grow,
like an invasive species of happiness.
OtakaraDesc.OTARINGO:
[UE:Meta key="262df86ad36446518833bc9daaccc835" Scale="1"/]This fruit is a member of the plant
family "Bugeatenidae." As its name
implies, the Insect Condo is a popular
abode choice for a number of insects.
And who can blame the bugs for taking
up residence here? This fruit is not
just homey but also quite delicious.
OtakaraDesc.OTAMIKAN:
[UE:Meta key="a69d3887aba647a8b6c249ff78e223a8" Scale="1"/]It's worth noting this tasty fruit's
near-perfect round shape...which is
not unlike the face of a shrewd friend.
Meanwhile, the thick skin suggests
it's a survivor. It's seen things. It's
BEEN there. So let us look at it this
way: as with that friend of ours, it
might take us some effort to get
to the good stuff. But, oh, what a
reward once we do!
OtakaraDesc.OTADEKOPON:
[UE:Meta key="cb38a32fb5ae416faa886a622d9b44ec" Scale="1"/]Children love this fruit for its adorable
shape. See how it looks for all the
world like a jolly orange snowman? But
the Pocked Airhead is more than just a
cute character. Its taste is sweet, and
its strange, lumpy skin is easy to peel.
There's much to love about this citrus
snowman!
OtakaraDesc.OTALEMON:
[UE:Meta key="646ae4f5bc1544c899965b64888af9b0" Scale="1"/]The heart-squeezing excitement one
feels upon falling in love the first time
is not so different from the jaw-
clenching salivation that occurs
when one takes their first taste of
this fruit. I daresay both experiences
are thrilling...if just a touch painful.
OtakaraDesc.OTASQUEEZER:
[UE:Meta key="191eb52aa02c471ca872e3857dd1330b" Scale="1"/]Squeeze! Squeeze! Had enough? No?!
Well, let's squeeeeze some more!
A ruthless, savage heart beats inside
this machine. Indeed, no giant fruit can
retain its juice in the face of this
device's relentless wringing. But if it's
the very last drop you seek, then the
Merciless Extractor is for you!
OtakaraDesc.OTAPAINTSRED:
[UE:Meta key="003c210182404565934a33479f38d5a0" Scale="1"/]Red is red, of course...or is it? First,
there are many shades of red. And
second, even the same shade of
red means different things to
different individuals. For some,
red is a painful fire. For others,
it's a warm love. Maybe there's
a one-of-a-kind red for us all.
OtakaraDesc.OTAPAINTSBLU:
[UE:Meta key="067d803f92364fc2a11b000dda49919f" Scale="1"/]This tube of decorative blue goo is
sure to inspire creativity in anyone
who comes upon it. It should also be
a reminder to welcome new colors into
your life now and then. Don't get stuck
returning to the same hues over and
over again. Go wild! Unleash a new you!
OtakaraDesc.OTAPAINTSYEL:
[UE:Meta key="a29ce6760a714e55b16e32f74d788a18" Scale="1"/]In fortune-telling circles, this is the
color of illumination. It has the power
to light the path before us, showing
us which way to go if we want better
luck in life and, specifically, in
moneymaking endeavors. I hope the
Illumination Goo will light my way!
OtakaraDesc.OTAPAINTSPPL:
[UE:Meta key="4ec0bbceee814b0a8e95a51eaea85751" Scale="1"/]What a regal color this is! Noble and
dignified in hue, it demands a solemn
deference from all who gaze upon it.
No wonder it's the color of kings,
queens, and other folk of high status.
I confess—I yearn to have a coat made
of this color myself!
OtakaraDesc.OTAPAINTSWHT:
[UE:Meta key="ff9f5249c3584f709ff052b718de4c13" Scale="1"/]Some say this hue is the absence of all
color. Others say, in fact, it's all colors
combined. I, for one, believe both are
true. No, I don't know the whys and
hows of it. But I do know this color
goes nicely with every other color out
there. And that must mean something.
OtakaraDesc.OTAPAINTSBLK:
[UE:Meta key="e0b24b1c69a740e18b2f227c99df72ed" Scale="1"/]A bit of white. A bit of black. This
color has made its home halfway
between the two. Some say it's an
ambiguous hue that refuses to plant
its flag. But maybe it just enjoys living
between two ends of the spectrum,
enjoying the best of both worlds.
OtakaraDesc.OTAPAINTSPNK:
[UE:Meta key="92ea6ba8cb824349821cfc3c6176d272" Scale="1"/]This color! So charming! Anyone who
lays eyes upon it finds their mood
improved. Needless to say, it's the
go-to hue for painting cheeks and
lips when one is in the mood to
captivate. Would it work as well if I
painted it on my arms? Perhaps I'll try!
OtakaraDesc.OTAPAINTSAQU:
[UE:Meta key="85fde5fbf16f4a5ca842b25e90098a2c" Scale="1"/]This is neither the color of the sky
nor the color of the sea. Though it is
nearly the color of both. No, as blue
hues go, this one is like a cool splash
of water on your face...or like shaved
ice on a summer day...or like the calm
surface of the swimming pool after
my love swam away for the last time...
Oh! Oh my! I fear I got swept away
for a moment there.
OtakaraDesc.OTAPAINTSGRN:
[UE:Meta key="b0b2205b9884461ba0d0df6ddeee6632" Scale="1"/]Like a neon sign blinking at night or
a luminous bug flitting across a field
at sunset, this color grabs your eye
and doesn't let go. But will you follow
where it leads? Neon, by its very
nature, may lure you toward
adventure...or danger. Who knows
what a goo of this hue has in store
for you!
OtakaraDesc.OTABILLIARDBALLCUE:
[UE:Meta key="5bf5bff2c3b041ec9019981dc105bbd9" Scale="1"/]Behold this sublime sphere! A shape
this flawless does not exist in nature.
And so, since ancient times, this orb
and others like it have been treated
as sacred by the civilization here. Each
sphere has its own meaning. This one
represents truth of the deepest kind.
OtakaraDesc.OTABILLIARDBALL1:
[UE:Meta key="da342eea53074822aae112668e67f84f" Scale="1"/]It's said this sacred sphere has the
power to make the most deeply held
desires come true—more so than any
other orb in the Sacred Sphere Series.
Oh, what greedy wishes must have
been wished upon it! Surely the maker
of this orb wanted something near
unattainable. But who among us
hasn't felt such avarice?
OtakaraDesc.OTABILLIARDBALL2:
[UE:Meta key="33981d00f2b846228492faf8256ebec1" Scale="1"/]This sphere is believed to be the
patron of families. Parents often
implore it to help their children
flourish. And who can blame them?
Parents treasure their children, who
then treasure their own children, and
on and on it goes. Such endless love
is a beautiful thing.
OtakaraDesc.OTABILLIARDBALL3:
[UE:Meta key="15c1a5439e51472ba83d8caa6852a923" Scale="1"/]It's said there's nothing more difficult
to understand than the ways of the
heart. It's also said this sphere gives
the one who holds it the power to read
the heart of the one they love. But is
that a good idea? I'm not so sure it is.
OtakaraDesc.OTABILLIARDBALL4:
[UE:Meta key="0d2894e4f7034f90b8f26a3e31906337" Scale="1"/]When I stare at this sacred sphere,
phrases like "fresh start," "new life,"
and "clean slate" float before my eyes.
The Sphere of Beginnings is revered
for its power to open doors and sprout
fresh opportunities. It reminds us that
a new chapter is always just a
page away.
OtakaraDesc.OTABILLIARDBALL5:
[UE:Meta key="b77a4a6798284a5e93a9c6f23c7c23e9" Scale="1"/]Like those of us today, the ancient
civilization here prized good health.
But it was harder to come by in the
olden times, and so this orb became a
powerful charm for bringing vitality to
young and old alike. Even now, I feel
more alive just looking at it!
OtakaraDesc.OTABILLIARDBALL6:
[UE:Meta key="6fa07f056f6e4627882e0cb6afcf1c57" Scale="1"/]This sphere was painstakingly polished
and then hand-painted in the most
calming color possible. The deep green
here is meant to bring to mind a lush
forest, and in doing so, shoo away the
stresses of the day. Go on. Gaze upon
it. As the stress disappears, allow
a sense of well-being to take its place.
OtakaraDesc.OTABILLIARDBALL7:
[UE:Meta key="ec02eccf048c478a83df1dd3a23e3975" Scale="1"/]The symbol painted on the surface of
this sphere is believed to bring good
luck. The inhabitants here were known
to rub the orb before beginning a
journey or new undertaking. Did this
ritual actually bring them good luck?
We shall never know! But let us hope
it at least brought them comfort.
OtakaraDesc.OTABILLIARDBALL8:
[UE:Meta key="6984285872fe471aae27615596903a28" Scale="1"/]The inhabitants used this treasure in
ancient ceremonies as a way to foster
trust in their deities as well as in their
friends and family. Knowing that trust
was so important to them—as it is to
us—makes me think that perhaps
we aren't so different after all.
OtakaraDesc.OTABILLIARDBALL9:
[UE:Meta key="0013c187356745e2971800f5bddc78f2" Scale="1"/]This sphere is quite unique. That is, it
represents the very core—the pillar—
at the center of every living being.
And to keep our pillars strong, this orb
bids us do one simple thing: support
one another. What a message! It's one
for the ages and the whole universe!
OtakaraDesc.OTAPINBADGEA:
[UE:Meta key="13952b24883b4febbd1205f98eaff291" Scale="1"/]Even the blast from a rocket leaving
a planet can't penetrate this shield.
Its protective powers are so robust
that after years of use by a battle-
worn soldier, there's but one small
scratch on the surface. A fine piece
of vintage armor, to be sure.
OtakaraDesc.OTAPINBADGEB:
[UE:Meta key="db3f896ee4db48aeb338a2141950748c" Scale="1"/]See how this shield is engraved with
the image of a massive ringed planet?
In ancient times, the ring was thought
to be a curse that caused space
travelers to forever end up right back
where they began. But nowadays, the
ring has come to represent a joyful
return home after a long journey. It
was also customary to give this shield
to someone you love in hopes it would
bring them home to you safely.
OtakaraDesc.OTAPINBADGEC:
[UE:Meta key="747e954614a84572a98069a63f971492" Scale="1"/]Did you know that satellites are
highly vulnerable to meteors and
other space debris? This shield was
specially made for space workers
who protected these vital pieces of
tech from damage. If this shield can
withstand a blow from a meteor,
it can withstand anything!
OtakaraDesc.OTAPINBADGED:
[UE:Meta key="b23ab7df1b9343b0b40d8aaf0b2ffc72" Scale="1"/]Emblazoned across this shield is the
image of a hero beloved for leading
this civilization into the stars. Soldiers
who've fought enemy life-forms revere
this figure the most. Needless to say,
the shield is strong enough to be
worthy of heroes new and old.
OtakaraDesc.OTAPINBADGEE:
[UE:Meta key="cf222c057a7741e497ab29926b79c722" Scale="1"/]To be a great warrior, one must be
able to withstand not just one attack
but attack after attack. This small
but powerful shield is designed to
protect its owner from an onslaught
of blows that land like a shower of
shooting stars. Endurance is strength!
OtakaraDesc.OTAFRUITSPICKPNK:
[UE:Meta key="a0039f6ff8bb4c1286fd2ebce64d47b7" Scale="1"/]It's said that with this sword in hand,
one can triumph over any enemy. It's
also said the blade was given this hue
to inflame the warrior heart within.
I must say, my heart IS beating
faster, and yes, my blood has begun
to boil! Yes! Yes! Let the battle begin!
OtakaraDesc.OTAFRUITSPICKGRN:
[UE:Meta key="8d178505fc274df989d99fe40f308b40" Scale="1"/]This sword is known for bestowing on
its owner the power to make allies of
forest spirits. Clearly it was given this
odd green hue in anticipation of forest
combat. The color does seem rather
bright for any forest we know of. But
maybe forests here are very...vibrant?
OtakaraDesc.OTAFRUITSPICKBLU:
[UE:Meta key="4a9af238d82340378a41df51781d9959" Scale="1"/]Clearly this ancient sword was forged
in battle on some sort of an ice planet.
Just look at it! The deep-blue coloring
is evidence that it once had powers
that worked best in below-freezing
temperatures. I could swear, all these
eons later, it's still cold to the touch.
OtakaraDesc.OTAFRUITSPICKORN:
[UE:Meta key="9bb0b886e0994e4aad08b2eafda48ffe" Scale="1"/]This sword was once wielded by a hero
who stood on the battlefield, cutting
down enemies. It's said the sword's
bold color drew the enemies in and
distracted them. The hero made
easy work of them as they stared,
transfixed by his blade.
OtakaraDesc.OTAFRUITSPICKYEL:
[UE:Meta key="d8a0ca738ca9408f8f4f4856b88a3628" Scale="1"/]This sword's sunny sparkle is sure to
catch the eye of your opponent during
battle. And that's your chance! As
they blink away the brightness, thrust
the pointy end at their weak spot and
finish them! Cowardly? That's up to
you. History is written by the victor.
OtakaraDesc.OTAPUZZLEA:
[UE:Meta key="a20e3b43bf3c46489656b964e24c3a2b" Scale="1"/]This is where the mystery begins! See,
it's a fragment of something bigger...
Yes, a massive photo panel now
broken into pieces. But why?! The only
way to find out is to put the pieces
together again. The clues here tell me
this belongs in the top-left corner.
OtakaraDesc.OTAPUZZLEB:
[UE:Meta key="bfccff8262f142cc9a341964b9211260" Scale="1"/]This is merely one part of a much
larger picture. As for why this
image was broken into pieces... Well,
I suspect it's because it needed to be
safely transported, perhaps to an art
gallery, even. Once assembled, I won't
be surprised to find a masterpiece!
OtakaraDesc.OTAPUZZLEC:
[UE:Meta key="3ae2d336009a439090120c46f4f70339" Scale="1"/]Surely there's a reason this image was
broken into fragments. Could it be a
treasure map? Did someone split the
map into pieces and hide the bits?
Is today the day I strike it rich?! Ah,
perhaps I shouldn't count my fortune
before it's found.
OtakaraDesc.OTAPUZZLED:
[UE:Meta key="9fa57cf9aeaf47f1889445512a4059cd" Scale="1"/]This mysterious fragment appears to
be the top-right part of a giant photo.
Could it be a picture of a precious
moment in time? But why would such
a thing be broken into pieces? Was
someone trying to hide something?! 
I must see all the pieces! I must know!
OtakaraDesc.OTAPUZZLEE:
[UE:Meta key="de75bac85a44419cb219436acb6ccb05" Scale="1"/]Do I see a...face...in this picture
fragment? Is that part of a...smile...
I see? No, it couldn't be. Or could it...
Oh my, I feel like I'm going to see
whatever it is in my dreams.
OtakaraDesc.OTAPUZZLEF:
[UE:Meta key="89ed179c8a8640dda89c404d1199ba00" Scale="1"/]Such a wise eye staring out at me...
Yes, this certainly looks like the face
of a deeply intelligent creature. And
it's the strangest thing. I feel like I
know this animal well even though I've
never seen it before. I hope I get some
answers once all the pieces are found.
OtakaraDesc.OTAPUZZLEG:
[UE:Meta key="e9e2748b99204523b995cb9bbc40c9dd" Scale="1"/]That dark pupil staring out at me...
It's as if it can see right through me...
through anything and anyone. Surely
it has the power to know my deepest
secrets. Eh...good thing I don't have
anything to hide. No, really. I don't!
OK, stop looking at me like that!
OtakaraDesc.OTAPUZZLEH:
[UE:Meta key="c200945c462340fab882597de667c8a0" Scale="1"/]What do I see here? Is it nothing?
Is it everything? I feel like it could
be anything. Maybe this fragment
is part of a ceremony in which the
participants break up a photo of
a beloved deity so they can better
share it with one another. Yes,
that must be it!
OtakaraDesc.OTAPUZZLEI:
[UE:Meta key="996e0d6bca1640c9a6564a9c3783018f" Scale="1"/]Two flat sides...and a corner. Could
this fragment belong in the bottom-
left position? Or does it go up above
in the top-right spot? No, my gut
instincts say bottom left. Sometimes
your gut is all you have to go on, and
go you must.
OtakaraDesc.OTAPUZZLEJ:
[UE:Meta key="83d7e2d534c5415990a693d1c63012e9" Scale="1"/]We can ask ourselves WHY this photo
was broken into small, indiscernible
fragments, but...perhaps the answer
is that there is NO answer. It pains me
to say that. For those of us who try
to make sense of the world, this sort
of thing keeps us up at night.
OtakaraDesc.OTAPUZZLEK:
[UE:Meta key="c1d5d7e4015c4529945edbb6ab4c3a93" Scale="1"/]Take a look at this strange treasure.
Notice the gaps and protrusions.
I'm certain they'd mesh well with
something similar...yet different.
Maybe this is some sort of key that
opens something if you find the piece
that makes it whole. Exciting!
OtakaraDesc.OTAPUZZLEL:
[UE:Meta key="a704374318aa41ffb281ad27984e8dae" Scale="1"/]I'm almost certain one could use these
knobs and curves to connect this
fragment with other fragments. But...
why?! What would one accomplish by
doing such a thing? Quite puzzling, no?
Hmm, perhaps the partial picture seen
here would become more clear with
more fragments. Yes, that must be it!
How clever. And though the big picture
here remains unclear...the activity
itself is clearly quite fun!
OtakaraDesc.OTAKUSHIYAKI:
[UE:Meta key="107afccf781842ac9e91bbbf21dc572d" Scale="1"/]This dish was inspired by the legend of
the Four Grill Brothers. Two brothers
felt only meat was fit for a grill. The
others believed only veggies belonged.
A sword fight erupted among them.
They nearly skewered each other but
ended up creating this skewer instead!
OtakaraDesc.OTAHAM:
[UE:Meta key="61258dad4c4c41419ce399f3f2e648b6" Scale="1"/]I wouldn't normally think to call a meat
"majestic," but look at this thing! Large
and imposing, it demands a certain
respect from all who consider eating
it. I can almost hear it now... "You
think you can eat me whole, do you?
Bahaha! I dare you to do your worst!"
OtakaraDesc.OTASUSHIMAGURO:
[UE:Meta key="34a879fd3afc4eb88bd7af42db28fe31" Scale="1"/]After subsisting on the blandest of
space-faring food, I was not prepared
for the symphony of flavors this dish
unleashed on my tongue. The sublime
melding of the top and the bottom
flavors... Surely a culinary maestro
orchestrated this masterpiece.
OtakaraDesc.OTASUSHITAMAGO:
[UE:Meta key="1dbd9b8bd43f44faa270515ea1549f42" Scale="1"/]This food item looks for all the world
like it's wearing a belt around its
middle. Fashion choices aside, it
tastes like heaven! The yellow part—
whatever it may be—is surprisingly
sweet and delicious. Maybe more of
our foodstuffs should wear a belt?
OtakaraDesc.OTASUSHIEBI:
[UE:Meta key="447f1805b4b14fa68b619e9a92cffe73" Scale="1"/]As far as I can tell, this is some sort
of fish atop some sort of...white stuff.
The specifics don't matter as much as
the taste...which is good. Nothing too
fancy or ostentatious...just the kind
of back-to-basics flavor profile that
we all crave now and again.
OtakaraDesc.OTATAKOWIENER:
[UE:Meta key="068bf5978eb348adbc3a224f849b7425" Scale="1"/]Alien invasion? No, no...it's just an
octopus! Or is it? There's something
quite strange about this one. Could it
be a new species, perhaps? Well,
whatever this thing is, the way its
adorable beady eyes stare unblinkingly
at me... I'm almost certain it is
communicating telepathically
with me.
OtakaraDesc.OTAFISHCRUET:
[UE:Meta key="b582f3baa2ee41688d5665dfc7ce8cf5" Scale="1"/]What a mysterious new species of
fish! Its body is transparent, yet inside
it's full of a black liquid. Give it a good
squeeze, and this liquid squishes right
out. The liquid is tasty, although quite
salty, to be honest. Surely that must
mean it comes from the sea!
OtakaraDesc.OTAAMMOLITE:
[UE:Meta key="790937f94dfd49a4bc5fbf05b39239ef" Scale="1"/]This is the fossil of an ancient sea
creature. Sure, it looks like nothing but
a brown blob from above, but flip it
over, and...SURPRISE! It sparkles like a
gem lit from the inside! The iridescent
pattern reminds of a water-dwelling
newt found on my home planet.
OtakaraDesc.OTATRILOBITE:
[UE:Meta key="bfad2a2373744ca89192ce35994838ab" Scale="1"/]Clearly this is a fossil of a slipper
bug. These creatures lived in ancient
times and always traveled in pairs.
Quite often one would get separated
from the other, and no amount of
searching would reunite them. Wait...
am I thinking about real slippers?
OtakaraDesc.OTAROBOHEAD:
[UE:Meta key="11ae29cb72bf4e039e157489ea116ca3" Scale="1"/]Look at this robot. It was made to
command! To lead! The greatness is
in its eyes and in its horns! But how
can one be a great leader—robot or
otherwise—without followers?
Likewise, what is a head without a
body? Important questions for us
all to ask.
OtakaraDesc.OTAROBOBODY:
[UE:Meta key="c6291e52bab4427b9c1aeaebf84e26b0" Scale="1"/]Ah, the very heart of the robot! It all
comes together right here. Separate
parts join to become one. Voilà, a team
is born! It takes determination and
drive to pull everyone together, but
that's what the heart of a team does,
and that's how victory is won!
OtakaraDesc.OTAROBOHANDR:
[UE:Meta key="bb172fce64374de49e76a1a7013aeb00" Scale="1"/]Look at this robo arm! It's ready to
seize victory in its steely fist! It fires
at its enemies not out of anger but
out of necessity. It does what must be
done and never flinches from that
duty. Yes, that's what valor looks like.
And it's a good look indeed.
OtakaraDesc.OTAROBOHANDL:
[UE:Meta key="41db789438e94bb8aea4bbbef5eedd87" Scale="1"/]If the right arm is all about valor and
victory, the left arm is about love and
peace. You could say that while one
hand throws a punch, the other
reaches out for a handshake. This
symmetry is important. It keeps the
whole body—nay, the whole universe—
in balance.
OtakaraDesc.OTAROBOLEGR:
[UE:Meta key="0a3ef94bf58a4d8db6fd766329fd5981" Scale="1"/]This robot's right leg is planted solidly
on the ground. Its stance is firm! This
posture says, "You can do anything
if only you have the courage and the
conviction to do it." Inspiring, isn't it?
Yes! Yes, it is! Now I, too, am ready to
put my own foot down!
OtakaraDesc.OTAROBOLEGL:
[UE:Meta key="02bbc6ceccd54bd0aa3155bc6e20a51f" Scale="1"/]One can't afford to waffle on the
battlefield. Nor can one afford to rush
in with half-baked plans. Yes, courage
is required—but also calmness. Yes,
conviction is needed—but also
composure. You can rest assured the
left leg will stride into battle...but only
after careful consideration.
OtakaraDesc.OTAMATDOLLSA:
[UE:Meta key="393c34ab57c445d8bf08b37ba111b51a" Scale="1"/]This poor separated family! I know
they're only dolls, but it's still sad.
This grandchild was discovered inside
a dark, damp cave. Did she wander
off? How did she find herself in such
an unsuitable place? She must have
been so lonely! What a relief, then,
that she was rescued from such an
unfortunate fate.
OtakaraDesc.OTAMATDOLLSB:
[UE:Meta key="ca0586f2a6e94c33a178bc57696a15f6" Scale="1"/]It's hard to see a family separated,
even if they are "just dolls." Dolls or
not, they clearly want to be together.
This doll torso looks like it's in the
shape of a vase. Perhaps it's a good
place to put gifts to help the wayward
dolls get by until they're reunited. And
they WILL be reunited!
OtakaraDesc.OTAMATDOLLMA:
[UE:Meta key="dec89ad7a71d4e028368ed9fbecf7944" Scale="1"/]This doll inherited her wise look from
her mother. She's lucky to be part of
three generations that have handed
down only their best traits. Of course,
in reality, children often inherit our
very worst traits. Whose fault is
that? The answer: it's complicated.
OtakaraDesc.OTAMATDOLLMB:
[UE:Meta key="7fcd627ffa034d57a8f592f6599fa27c" Scale="1"/]Children mooch off of their parents
all the time. Don't try to deny it! But
to be fair, parents love to be needed.
So perhaps they actually like it a bit
when their child comes to them with
their hand out? Anyhoo, this looks like
a good place to store mooched items.
OtakaraDesc.OTAMATDOLLLA:
[UE:Meta key="20c1bb8add604357b92e19e5aa00bb3f" Scale="1"/]You want to see the face of a parent?
Well, here it is. It's a commanding
visage, no? And yet somehow still
warm and inviting. This doll, in her
infinite wisdom, knows she must strike
the perfect balance between strict
expectations and eternal love.
OtakaraDesc.OTAMATDOLLLB:
[UE:Meta key="7cbc907ea10c4f84812fca579e9f5eb7" Scale="1"/]Look at this enormous vase. Like a
parent who's given too much to a
child, it's completely empty. Is this all
that remains of a sad story? Maybe.
Maybe not. Only that parent can say
whether giving so much brought them
disappointment...or the greatest joy.
OtakaraDesc.OTATRAINA:
[UE:Meta key="831050c606a6430c9fa0827202cad7c8" Scale="1"/]Some people love to ride the rails
because it reminds them of the past.
Others ride the rails because they're
excited about what lies in the future.
I say a train trip is more than just
transportation...it is unlimited
possibility. Hop aboard and find out!
OtakaraDesc.OTATRAINB:
[UE:Meta key="f4ea58d2c7cb4861b7226597ee4c1b6a" Scale="1"/]This tank car works hard! It carries
heavy and difficult-to-handle loads.
Yes, it is pulled along by its superior,
but it does a vital job connecting that
leader to the cars behind it. It may
be the middle management of rail cars,
but that's nothing to be ashamed of!
OtakaraDesc.OTATRAINC:
[UE:Meta key="14d2751b03e147799413d9721a3a09c0" Scale="1"/]Passenger cars like this aren't fancy,
and yet there's something elegant
about taking a ride in one. You simply
recline in your seat and stare out the
window as someone ferries you to
where you need to go. This kind of
leisure has a dignity about it, no?
OtakaraDesc.OTARAILWAYLINEA:
[UE:Meta key="f38b3f7e8a814b568fe1f7b2537fc17e" Scale="1"/]This is a place where lives intersect
in all sorts of ways. Some people come
here for sad goodbyes—others come
for happy hellos. Some people find
themselves here, wondering where
they're going next. Is this a train
stop or a life stop...or maybe both?
OtakaraDesc.OTARAILWAYLINEB:
[UE:Meta key="f5f0878be0f342d7b25e215b6adc6700" Scale="1"/]This straight railway track is perfect
for the person who knows exactly
where they want to go in life: from
point A directly to point B. No twists,
no turns, and no turning back. It may
not be the most adventurous route,
but adventure is not for everyone.
OtakaraDesc.OTARAILWAYLINEC:
[UE:Meta key="6110cf12167f4c829500e099533347a6" Scale="1"/]What a profound curve this track here
exhibits. It's not so different from life.
Sometimes you think you know where
you're going, but then a curve in the
track takes you for an unexpected
ride. There's no getting off this train,
so sit back and enjoy the surprise.
OtakaraDesc.OTARAILWAYLINED:
[UE:Meta key="91bac2c9fbe14eb79797bd1dea0fff4b" Scale="1"/]Sometimes in life, you lay down a track
that seems straight as an arrow. But
the fact is, it's not straight. Not at all.
Follow that track, and you could end
up right back where you started. But
don't let that get you down. Maybe
you're right back where you should be.
OtakaraDesc.OTARAILWAYLINEE:
[UE:Meta key="a74219f32d5148c4ac6284ff3bff186c" Scale="1"/]When a sharp turn catches you by
surprise, what do you do? Slam on the
brakes, or throw open the throttle?
No matter which choice you make,
you're in for a heart-pounding thrill
ride. Best to grab for that seat belt if
you've got one.
OtakaraDesc.OTADUCKL:
[UE:Meta key="5f15477f44d041b296b141619892d7b4" Scale="1"/]Have you ever laid eyes on something
more adorable? I, for one, have not!
Gazing upon its features fills me with...
Is it admiration? Awe? Well, whatever
it is, I recommend everyone open their
eyes and their hearts to this sublime
(and squeaky!) being.
OtakaraDesc.OTADUCKM:
[UE:Meta key="f9f1e3afa8ef4f5eba77ef572f0a0a26" Scale="1"/]Look at those adorable features and
darling proportions! This creature may
be rather medium in size, but that does
not mean it is a medium amount of
cuteness. No! I'm quite certain it
possesses enough cuteness to
charm an entire planet!
OtakaraDesc.OTADUCKS:
[UE:Meta key="4bdd19f13b9d4f6cbda0b81c187efc99" Scale="1"/]Ah, fret not, Stately Rubber Cutie.
Yes, you may be smallish in size, but
that does not matter. Cute is cute.
In fact, it's quite possible you're even
MORE cute because of your smallness.
Yes, I do believe you are.
OtakaraDesc.OTADUCKB:
[UE:Meta key="fba7fb3ef4a9451daf0a6923bc9c4a5f" Scale="1"/]Just look at this fellow! Dressed to
impress in all black. And impressed
I most certainly am. So impressed
I can't stop staring. I do hope it'll
forgive me. It's just hard to act normal
around someone so dapper. It truly is.
OtakaraDesc.OTAFIELDGLASS:
[UE:Meta key="81d77c101b824f80ae205b005dbc3566" Scale="1"/]This massive scope allows two viewers
to stand side by side and see far into
the distance. As if that wasn't
impressive enough, it looks as if its
design was based on dragon eyes.
It's just the thing for a couple of
adventurous explorers who hate
taking turns!
OtakaraDesc.OTAPOCKETWATCH:
[UE:Meta key="5a02209dcaea437193bbb5ee7748dda1" Scale="1"/]This piece of technology doesn't work,
so there's no way to confirm it...but
I believe in my heart of hearts that it
is part of a time machine. A foolish
belief, maybe. But I have faith that the
future holds many great things, and
this is simply a sign of what's to come!
OtakaraDesc.OTACOMPASS:
[UE:Meta key="55267ac36ce44e2cb317610c23df0356" Scale="1"/]This astounding device indicates which
direction fate is flowing. By reading
the magnetic fields found on planets
and in living organisms alike, it can
read one's fortune. The science is too
complex to explain, but whether you go
north or south, do heed its guidance.
OtakaraDesc.OTALOUPE:
[UE:Meta key="164116e257244bb6a3c8acd6fa7d1d5b" Scale="1"/]Surely this powerful viewing device
was used by a brilliant professor
trying to catch a glimpse of the truth
hiding in the most fundamental level
of the universe. But when they looked
through here, did they find that
truth? And did the truth look bigger
and a bit out of focus?
OtakaraDesc.OTAEFFECTSUNIT:
[UE:Meta key="62346b2c0fe8423c9840bfdeaa3b229c" Scale="1"/]The implications of this technology
are quite frightening. Not only does it
broadcast music played by a musician
but pieces of the musician's own soul.
We always knew they put their hearts
and souls into their songs. But this
takes it to a whole new level!
OtakaraDesc.OTAFINGERBOARD:
[UE:Meta key="4a4d2a5271d04d69ace3c27eab69bd0f" Scale="1"/]To use this mode of transportation,
you must stand on the trolley and kick
the ground to propel yourself forward.
You can also sit on the trolley and
push yourself along with your hands.
It's more thrilling than riding a typical
trolley...but also a lot more work.
OtakaraDesc.OTA3DMEGANE:
[UE:Meta key="b6960aaf81fd49dc811a44ab9a5632e3" Scale="1"/]The technology built into these specs
is incredible! To begin, there's a filter
in each lens that alters the light at
the quantum level. Dimensions are
converted in the process, and things
you couldn't see that were right in
front of you are revealed. Eye-opening!
OtakaraDesc.OTASHUTTERGLASSES:
[UE:Meta key="bb2e775eae8d44f59dc7bf420e892de9" Scale="1"/]An incredible invention! These glasses
block out things you don't want to see
while letting you see the things you DO
want to see. Is this a healthy way to
view the world? I'm not sure it is. But
I'm also not here to judge.
OtakaraDesc.OTABANKCARDA:
[UE:Meta key="f4a01be2a09948ae99f1f6c1f9c5cbf1" Scale="1"/]This symbol looks like a container of
some sort...perhaps one that contains
life itself. I get a sense of vitality from
it...almost as if the more of these you
have, the more power you have to
overcome adversity. But be careful.
I'm sure they're not easy to obtain.
OtakaraDesc.OTABANKCARDB:
[UE:Meta key="c87c962716fb4180aae9b8c3683a781e" Scale="1"/]There can be no doubt that the symbol
seen here represents power. Look at
it. Everything about it screams
"strength"! Surely in the right (and
even wrong) hands, its power would
be immense. Perhaps it's best not
to approach it unless you have to.
OtakaraDesc.OTABANKCARDC:
[UE:Meta key="41cdcc0f51df4387a8d1107433efd293" Scale="1"/]I feel certain the shape seen here
represents wisdom. Just look at its
arching symmetry! It is elegant but not
ostentatious. Complex but not overly
ornate. It brings to mind scholars
with noses in books and scientists
working toward conclusions.
OtakaraDesc.OTABANKCARDD:
[UE:Meta key="887c53c3582244efacb92830dc324320" Scale="1"/]Looking at these symbols all lined up...
I feel my heartbeat quicken, and yes,
I feel this rush of warmth that must
be...love. This kind of love says,
"Cherish all things. Love yourself—love
your enemies—love everything!" It's a
tall order, but I will try!
OtakaraDesc.OTABANKCARDE:
[UE:Meta key="9c49a23a21e344dfb304e4b8d1783698" Scale="1"/]My mind wanders to dark places when
I look at these symbols. All I see are
gemstones—and ill-gotten gemstones,
at that. Perhaps they're stolen jewels,
confiscated by police and laid out like
this as evidence. The stink of crime is
in the air!
OtakaraDesc.OTABANKCARDF:
[UE:Meta key="5f375773d1834a84b75c2d090b0b22b2" Scale="1"/]I don't know what it is about these
symbols that puts me at ease, but
they do. Might be a good idea to hang
this sheet up at the workplace when
the stress starts kicking in. Of
course, without stress...how will
I get my work done? Quite the
conundrum, no?
OtakaraDesc.OTABANKCARDBLANK:
[UE:Meta key="56094fd991554f84891cc88431cc9c14" Scale="1"/]This portrait shows a half-man,
half-fish deity worshipped by ancient
sailors. He was known for being both
kind and cruel. One minute he'd test
the sailors by sending bad weather
their way—the next he'd save them
with a blast of air from his horn
to their sails.
OtakaraDesc.OTABANKCARDBLANK2:
[UE:Meta key="bbf643aa7f8b42fab730e544931d2161" Scale="1"/]What an unsettling portrait! Just look
at that devilish face, not to mention
that clown-like getup...and that odd
grin! What IS he up to? No good, I say!
No, there's nothing more unnerving
than when someone smiles at you...
and you aren't sure why.
OtakaraDesc.KINKAISTATION:
[UE:Meta key="f2d8a6660bc845af8c876df52beb9925" Scale="1"/]What can I say that hasn't been said
a thousand times before? Obviously
it's gorgeous! And oh, how it glitters!
Still, it's not every day one gets to see
a Gold Nugget of THIS size. Will the
wonders of this strange planet ever
cease? I certainly hope not!
OtakaraDesc.OTATOMATOM:
[UE:Meta key="8518b502815e4466b239f3e4dfe52bf7" Scale="1"/]I don't know what it is about this
fruit...vegetable...whatever it is...but
take one bite, and your heart is sure
to heat up. I know mine does. Is it love
at first bite? Or am I just imagining
things?
OtakaraDesc.OTATOMATOS:
[UE:Meta key="6b2c8373c2fa44888266bcab665086cb" Scale="1"/]If a crush was a taste rather than a
feeling, this fruit is where you'd go to
experience it. The feeling starts small
when you take that first bite and think,
"Humph...I'm not so sure I like it." But
then you take another bite...and
another...only to discover that you not
only like the taste but have come to
love it. Suddenly you have a full-blown
food crush on your hands! Just
remember—many things in life are an
acquired taste. So be sure to keep an
open mind.
OtakaraDesc.OTATAKENOKO:
[UE:Meta key="bdb2f366b3b4482c9aaa53738c869f6c" Scale="1"/]This plant grows very fast, which
makes it a joy to tend to for garden
enthusiasts. It also makes a great
snack. Isn't it nice when a thing brings
happiness to your life in more than one
way? I say those are the sorts of
things worth keeping around!
OtakaraDesc.OTAZUCCHINI:
[UE:Meta key="b89886912389465caa9edb411f65b734" Scale="1"/]This gourd's selling point is the
diversity of ways it can be eaten.
Boil it, bake it, or fry it...it all works!
Added bonus: when you stand it on
end with the stem up, it looks like a
fellow with a crew cut. Ha!
OtakaraDesc.OTAPOTATO:
[UE:Meta key="0b1af7e5800248f5948dd4f93c1b73bb" Scale="1"/]This plant sucks the good things out
of the ground it grows in to get its
lumpy, round shape. No, it doesn't look
all that exciting, but I suspect the
nutritional value is quite high.
OtakaraDesc.OTASWEETPOTATO:
[UE:Meta key="ab97393a41694e8286f80909ca7c1152" Scale="1"/]This vegetable was tended to with the
utmost care...doted on, you might say.
You can tell by its exceptional flavor
and nutritional value. Yes, all the love
given to it has turned it into a sweet
and savory food treat. Delicious
and delightful!
OtakaraDesc.OTAEGGPLANT:
[UE:Meta key="72ebe006fced463f83f6d353f13da0f6" Scale="1"/]I'm told this strange fruit is called a
Foolish Fruit. With its odd shape and
silly hat, it does have a rather goofy
air about it. Still, there's no need to
make fun. It's perfect just how it is.
OtakaraDesc.OTAPEANUT:
[UE:Meta key="d6f304c0132f47d3a96c858ffca77943" Scale="1"/]I love how this stylish bean comes with
its very own hard wrapper. It's as if it
was made to be carried around and
snacked on at a convenient time.
It smells quite yummy too. Funnily
enough, even thinking about having a
bite makes me get quite thirsty.
OtakaraDesc.OTAPUMPKIN:
[UE:Meta key="364093f5e66947faa184ba689920b0e8" Scale="1"/]I understand that ancient literature
from this planet tells of a noblewoman
who used this fruit's rind as a carriage.
Clever! Additional lore tells of some
sort of midnight deadline and missing
footwear. Literature is complicated.
OtakaraDesc.OTACANDYSTICK:
[UE:Meta key="c05920b9c4af485b8df997aab25bed1c" Scale="1"/]What a sweet stick this is! Quite
literally, this stick here is made of
candy from top to bottom. This
unexpected combination makes it quite
the handy thing to have around. You
can use it as a walking stick to
prevent yourself from stumbling while
hiking or exploring unfamiliar terrain.
When all that exertion makes you
hungry, you'll find sustenance right
there in your hand. A useful invention,
to be sure!
OtakaraDesc.OTAPUDDING:
[UE:Meta key="1418e3ce5e1a4d7db13d2822af47b6dc" Scale="1"/]Even a slight touch will make this
treasure jiggle and wiggle in the most
wonderful way. Yet for all the seismic
stresses, it never collapses! Still,
what's even more entrancing than
the Jiggle-Jiggle's wiggle is its taste.
The sweetness will make YOU tremble!
OtakaraDesc.OTAECLAIR:
[UE:Meta key="93a3e4addc73423e91665e8f414a1a24" Scale="1"/]Be warned—if you take a bite of this
doughy raft, you'll quickly find yourself
awash in a torrential river of sweet
cream. Your only choice is to eat, eat,
eat as quickly as you can. If you can't
keep up, ask someone to throw you a
life preserver before it's too late!
OtakaraDesc.OTAISOBEYAKI:
[UE:Meta key="c7c41e57bb5e407781fb4096333c9162" Scale="1"/]This treasure takes a sophisticated
palate to appreciate. First, a salty-
sweet sauce is put atop some kind of
white foodstuff. It's then fried and
topped with a thin black layer of...
paper? It sounds awful, but it tastes
wonderful. Surprising in the best way!
OtakaraDesc.OTAYOSHICOOKIEA:
[UE:Meta key="beebc9ca5e834e5bae74b3028934ac78" Scale="1"/]Someone went to great lengths to
first nibble this cookie into a perfect
circle and then to nibble a perfect
circle out of the middle of the cookie.
The cookie craftsmanship exhibited
here...it's mind-boggling, really.
OtakaraDesc.OTAYOSHICOOKIEB:
[UE:Meta key="9ae2c9f8be144edeb4492357fec05348" Scale="1"/]It's said the two colors in this cookie
bring good luck to one's family and to
one's business. In fact, it was a
tradition here for families to gather
around a cookie and eat it together.
There's even a saying about it:
"The family that eats a cookie
together gets rich together."
OtakaraDesc.OTAYOSHICOOKIEC:
[UE:Meta key="f3add86777be429ba8e4a820349f04c3" Scale="1"/]Is it possible for a cookie to be TOO
delicious? It seems it is. This very
cookie is so incredibly tasty that it
vanishes almost as soon as it appears.
Where it goes...nobody knows. But if
you ever want to taste it, you'll have
to move fast!
OtakaraDesc.OTAYOSHICOOKIED:
[UE:Meta key="3c7528f71b4d487db2eee942661f4e8a" Scale="1"/]Do they love me? Do they love me
not? These are the questions we have
all asked ourselves at one time or
another. And this cookie has the
answer. Simply eat each tasty petal
as you ask your question. What will
the answer be? The final bite will tell!
OtakaraDesc.OTAYOSHICOOKIEE:
[UE:Meta key="3429ba1fd6df4f78a81facbf743dbcb6" Scale="1"/]The shape of this treasure represents
perhaps the most important things
there are in the universe. Life and
love. If you pour your heart into this
cookie and give it to someone you
care about, it's sure to have a
powerful effect on them.
OtakaraDesc.OTAMACARONA:
[UE:Meta key="b80d9d7a7f5c4ffdb2d9a8cabbe58a98" Scale="1"/]This spaceship was clearly styled
to look like a cake with fruit atop it.
I suspect it was specially designed for
couples heading to space on their
honeymoon. Goodness, I hope no one
tries to eat it. The ship might crash in
some strange locale! Hardly the idyllic
vacation newlyweds dream of.
OtakaraDesc.OTAMACARONB:
[UE:Meta key="64cd5d9a99fa436082a517cf96cb08ac" Scale="1"/]What a refreshing aroma! And what
charming decorations! And that
gorgeous color too! Popular with the
young crowd, this spaceship wakes
you up as it whisks you away on a
minty-fresh journey to another planet.
Just don't take a bite out of it,
or you'll never make it back.
OtakaraDesc.OTAMACARONC:
