[UE:Meta key="00e4a90e35194f1f88e0a311dc3ed383" Scale="1"/]It was this adorable ship's yummy
smell that lured me in. Then, suddenly,
I was taking a bite. Lo and behold,
I found the ship to be...edible! In fact,
it's chocolate flavored! I'm still not
quite sure what to make of this
discovery. All I know is...it's a
DELICIOUS one.
OtakaraDesc.OTAJAMICHIGO:
[UE:Meta key="8f5fa852f52a4b1ca4eaf10f348ab884" Scale="1"/]The sweet flavor of the Sunseed Berry
has been condensed and placed into
this bottle for safekeeping. So clever!
So delicious! But imagine the squabble
that breaks out every time this jar is
opened. Something this yummy would
be the envy of everyone at the table.
OtakaraDesc.OTACROISSANT:
[UE:Meta key="9c717be7063645dc816a29feb30d3dec" Scale="1"/]Flaky layer upon flaky layer of buttery,
mouth-melting dough baked to golden
perfection... Indeed, this is temptation
in bread form. You will try to eat
a "reasonable" amount. But some
strange force has hold of your taste
buds, and thus "reasonable" has no
meaning. Devastatingly delicious!
OtakaraDesc.OTAWAFFLE:
[UE:Meta key="feffc3972a8a4ee49ce09b1a1d3afbf6" Scale="1"/]Did you know this lumpy cake doubles
as a cushion? What a clever idea, no?
It's just the right amount of softness
and firmness for sitting on. And when
you grow hungry, you just take a bite.
What a sweet treat it is too! Who knew
a cushion could be so satisfying?
OtakaraDesc.OTAPRETZEL:
[UE:Meta key="7ae3d096593c402eae469a4ae9792a4d" Scale="1"/]This snack not only satisfies hunger
but intellectual curiosity too. How do
the arms of this snack intertwine like
that? Get some friends together, and
talk it over while you nibble away on
the problem itself. You're sure to
arrive at the tasty answer eventually!
OtakaraDesc.OTADICE4SIDED:
[UE:Meta key="d44dc8e9db7446eda35441eff03f52ec" Scale="1"/]This tool can be helpful when one finds
oneself faced with an especially hard
choice. Simply roll this stone and leave
the decision to fate. But when the roll
ends abruptly, will you like the decision
fate picked for you...or will you wish
you decided for yourself?
OtakaraDesc.OTADICE6WHT:
[UE:Meta key="4be73d36902447d3b763561a9df6c740" Scale="1"/]This mysterious stone is quite heavy,
but once it's rolled, it's relentless in
its pursuit of fate. Six sides and six
paths await you. Where the roll lands,
so goes your life! Now, can you master
the work of art that is your fate?
OtakaraDesc.OTADICE12:
[UE:Meta key="785ce4c531154b22a4caec7492848061" Scale="1"/]Rolling this stone so that it lands on
the specific symbol you want is no
easy task. Twelve sides is a lot of
sides! Why even try? But when you do
at last get the symbol you hoped
for—what a thrill! It's sure to keep
you trying again and again.
OtakaraDesc.OTADICE20:
[UE:Meta key="f1e85452e632408f9d2a643f03597b71" Scale="0.9962825"/]With this many sides, how is this
totem not just a sphere? Give it a
roll, and it seems like it might never
stop. And when it does...well, there
are so very many numbers it could land
on. Does it really matter which one?
Best to just go with the flow.
OtakaraDesc.OTAHANAFUDAA:
[UE:Meta key="e35afbdac95f4251ba6e5da5e665b487" Scale="1"/]The citizens of this planet once wished
upon this luck wafer for a long life.
You see, the strange bird pictured
there is said to live a very long life.
Additionally, the bird seems to be
facing a supernova—the final stage
of a star's existence. Ah, to live for
billions of years like star does... One
can hardly even imagine it!
OtakaraDesc.OTAHANAFUDAB:
[UE:Meta key="adc9993464994fa79680672d8042d84a" Scale="1"/]Starting school, getting a new job...
People in ancient times prayed to this
luck wafer at moments of big change
in their lives. Flowers do bring to mind
new beginnings, so it makes sense.
We all want to blossom, don't we?
OtakaraDesc.OTAHANAFUDAC:
[UE:Meta key="707994715e394860843e04e4ad87389e" Scale="1"/]The ancient people of this planet
used this luck wafer during wedding
ceremonies. They did so because the
moon is the object one stares at when
one thinks about someone they love.
Or at least, that's what I stare at
when I have love on my mind. Alas,
at this very moment, I have no one
to think about.
OtakaraDesc.OTAHANAFUDAD:
[UE:Meta key="061a9dbc7d874c2c9ed4507ad76b9b45" Scale="1"/]The ancient people turned to this
luck wafer when things weren't going
well for them. It served as a reminder
that no matter how much it rained, the
storm always eventually passed. And
the same goes for bad times. These,
too, always blow away on the breeze.
OtakaraDesc.OTAHANAFUDAE:
[UE:Meta key="55ee16aad77443dbbeed5d6a03e3c301" Scale="1"/]I've heard a story about a company
that was in decline. But when they
hung this wafer above the entry door,
their performance shot up from the
ashes like a phoenix. Hmm...maybe if
I hang this picture, it will light a fire
under my appraisal business.
